title: Les Amants du Marche
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Western, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, French
description: Organic restaurant located in the north of Pau. Offer creative meals with vegan options prepared using local produce. Drinks menu includes fresh fruit and vegetable juices, beer, cider, wine from local organic family farms, aperitif, tea, and coffee. The atmosphere is pleasant. Reservation suggested for dinner. Change of owners since 2013.
